full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI SGRON MA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012B BYANG @013A *, ,CHUB LAM GYI SGRON MA SLOB DPON CHEN PO DPAL MAR ME MDZAD YE SHES KYIS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO, ,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO D'I BAm K'A RA SHR'I DZNY'A NA DANG, BOD KYI LO TZTSA DGE SLONG DGE BA'I BLO GROS KYIS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O, ,(BYANG CHUB LAM GYI SGRON MA'I GLEGS BAM 'DI, ,DVAS PHU SENGE NA ZLTHU PHA BU GNYIS, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE SPAR DU LEGS GRUB DGES, ,'GRO KUN LAM BZANG 'DI DANG MI 'GRUB SHOG , , ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
